DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability 4 daily dos RWJ-333369 adjunctive treatment refractory partial epilepsy subject 18 70 year age , inclusive
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1870 year old , 2 . Diagnosis epilepsy least 1 year , 3 . Presenting , average , least 3 partial onset seizure per month , 4 . Currently treat stable dose ( i.e. , least 4 week ) 3 antiepileptic drug ( AEDs ) , 1 . Have experience status epilepticus past 3 month , 2 . Have serious disease , 3 . History major psychiatric disorder within past 2 year . 4 . Have receive experimental drug/device within past 30 day 5 . Are pregnant breastfeeding .
